# Data Source: okta_push_groups

Gets a list of Push Group mappings for an Application in Okta.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "okta_push_groups" "sample" {
  app_id = "<okta_app_id>"
}

output "sample" {
  value = data.okta_push_groups.sample.mappings
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `app_id` (String) The ID of the Okta Application.

### Read-Only

- `mappings` (List of Object) List of Push Group mappings for the Application. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--mappings))

<a id="nestedatt--mappings"></a>
### Nested Schema for `mappings`

Read-Only:

- `app_id` (String)
- `id` (String)
- `source_group_id` (String)
- `status` (String)
